title: The country-wake a comedy, as it is acted at the New Theatre in Little Lincoln's-Inn-Fields by His Majesty's servants / written by Mr. Tho. Dogget.
author: Dogget, Thomas, d. 1721.
notes: Advertisement: t.p. and p. 71-[1] at end.
Reduced to a ballad farce in 1768 and produced as "Flora, or, Hob in the well."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
